meanings.definition: Inflammation of the stomach and intestines, typically resulting from bacterial toxins or viral infection.
meanings.sent1: After eating spoiled food, she developed gastroenteritis and felt very sick.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed him with gastroenteritis after he complained of stomach pain and vomiting.
meanings.sent3: The party buffet was so bad that it felt like gastroenteritis was the main course.
meanings.sent4: The spread of rumors in the office caused a gastroenteritis of anxiety among the employees.
meanings.sent5: The image of tiny bacteria attacking the stomach and intestines stuck with her as she learned about gastroenteritis.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by inflammation of the stomach and intestines, causing symptoms such as diarrhea, vomiting, and abdominal pain.
meanings.sent1: His gastroenteritis caused him to miss a week of school due to constant stomach cramps.
meanings.sent2: The outbreak of gastroenteritis in the daycare led to many children feeling unwell.
meanings.sent3: The cat's refusal to eat the new food resulted in a case of gastroenteritis for the poor pet.
meanings.sent4: The political turmoil in the country was like a gastroenteritis of chaos affecting everyone.
meanings.sent5: The vivid description of gastroenteritis in the health class made her never want to skip handwashing again.
